word.maori: Kia ora tou ngakau i tou hoa wahine e aroha na koe i nga ra katoa o tou oranga horihori, i homai nei ki a koe i raro i te ra, i nga ra katoa o tou horihori: ko te wahi hoki tena mou i tenei ao, i tou mauiui ano hoki e mauiui na koe i raro i te ra.
word.cebuano: Pagpuyo nga malipayon uban sa imong asawa nga imong gihigugma sa tanang mga adlaw sa imong kinabuhi sa kakawangan, nga iyang gihatag kanimo ilalum sa adlaw, sa tanan nimong mga adlaw sa kakawangan: kay kana mao ang imong bahin sa kinabuhi, ug sa imong buhat nga imo nga ginabuhat ilalum sa adlaw.
word.hebrew: ט ראה חיים עם אשה אשר אהבת כל ימי חיי הבלך אשר נתן לך תחת השמש כל ימי הבלך  כי הוא חלקך בחיים ובעמלך אשר אתה עמל תחת השמש
word.hebrewmodern: ראה חיים עם אשה אשר אהבת כל ימי חיי הבלך אשר נתן לך תחת השמש כל ימי הבלך כי הוא חלקך בחיים ובעמלך אשר אתה עמל תחת השמש׃
word.greekot: ἰδὲ ζωὴν μετὰ γυναικός ἧς ἠγάπησας πάσας ἡμέρας ζωῆς ματαιότητός σου τὰς δοθείσας σοι ὑπὸ τὸν ἥλιον πάσας ἡμέρας ματαιότητός σου ὅτι αὐτὸ μερίς σου ἐν τῇ ζωῇ σου καὶ ἐν τῷ μόχθῳ σου ᾧ σὺ μοχθεῖς ὑπὸ τὸν ἥλιον

word.kjv: Sing, O barren, thou that didst not bear; break forth into singing, and cry aloud, thou that didst not travail with child: for more are the children of the desolate than the children of the married wife, saith the LORD.
word.thailand: "จงร้องเพลงเถิด โอ หญิงหมันเอ๋ย ผู้ไม่คลอดบุตร จงเปล่งเสียงร้องเพลงและร้องเสียงดัง เจ้าผู้ไม่ได้เจ็บครรภ์ ด้วยว่าบุตรของผู้อยู่อย่างโดดเดี่ยวก็ยังจะมีมากกว่าบุตรของภรรยาที่ได้แต่งงาน" พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสดังนี้
word.spanish1909: ALÉGRATE, oh estéril, la que no paría; levanta canción, y da voces de júbilo, la que nunca estuvo de parto: porque más son los hijos de la dejada que los de la casada, ha dicho Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Lauda, sterilis, quæ non paris ; decanta laudem, et hinni, quæ non pariebas : quoniam multi filii desertæ magis quam ejus quæ habet virum, dicit Dominus.
word.italian1927: Giubila, o sterile, tu che non partorivi! Da’ in gridi di gioia ed esulta, tu che non provavi doglie di parto! Poiché i figliuoli della derelitta saran più numerosi dei figliuoli di colei che ha marito, dice l’Eterno.
word.german1912: Rühme, du Unfruchtbare, die du nicht gebierst! Freue dich mit Rühmen und jauchze, die du nicht schwanger bist! Denn die Einsame hat mehr Kinder, als die den Mann hat, spricht der HERR.
word.french1910: Réjouis-toi, stérile, toi qui n'enfantes plus! Fais éclater ton allégresse et ta joie, toi qui n'as plus de douleurs! Car les fils de la délaissée seront plus nombreux Que les fils de celle qui est mariée, dit l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華對以色列的愛不能生育、沒有生養過孩子的啊！你要歡呼。沒有生產過的啊！你要發聲歡呼，高聲呼喊。因為棄婦比有夫之婦有更多兒子。這是耶和華說的。
word.korean: 잉태치 못하며 생산치 못한 너는 노래할지어다 구로치 못한 너는 외쳐 노래할지어다 홀로 된 여인의 자식이 남편있는 자의 자식보다 많음이니라 여호와의 말이니라
word.tagalog: Umawit ka, Oh baog, ikaw na hindi nanganak; ikaw ay magbiglang umawit, at humiyaw ng malakas, ikaw na hindi nagdamdam ng panganganak: sapagka't higit ang mga anak ng binawaan kay sa mga anak ng may asawa, sabi ng Panginoon.
word.maori: ¶ Waiata, e te pakoko, e koe kahore ano nei i whanau: kia pakaru mai te waiata, hamama, e koe kahore ano kia whakamamae: he tini hoki nga tamariki a te noho kau i nga tamariki a te mea whai hoa, e ai ta Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Pag-awit, Oh apuli, ikaw nga wala manganak; hunat sa pag-awit, ug suminggit ka sa makusog, ikaw nga wala gayud mag-antus sa pagpanganak: kay labi pang daghan ang mga anak sa biniyaan kay sa mga anak sa kinasal nga asawa, nagaingon si Jehova.
word.hebrew: א רני עקרה לא ילדה פצחי רנה וצהלי לא חלה כי רבים בני שוממה מבני בעולה אמר יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: רני עקרה לא ילדה פצחי רנה וצהלי לא חלה כי רבים בני שוממה מבני בעולה אמר יהוה׃
word.greekot: εὐφράνθητι στεῖρα ἡ οὐ τίκτουσα ῥῆξον καὶ βόησον ἡ οὐκ ὠδίνουσα ὅτι πολλὰ τὰ τέκνα τῆς ἐρήμου μᾶλλον ἢ τῆς ἐχούσης τὸν ἄνδρα εἶπεν γὰρ κύριος

word.kjv: For the LORD hath called thee as a woman forsaken and grieved in spirit, and a wife of youth, when thou wast refused, saith thy God.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ได้ทรงเรียกเจ้า ดังภรรยาผู้ถูกละทิ้งและโทมนัสในใจ เหมือนภรรยาสาวเมื่อนางถูกทิ้ง" พระเจ้าของเจ้าตรัสดังนี้
word.spanish1909: Porque como á mujer dejada y triste de espíritu te llamó Jehová, y como á mujer moza que es repudiada, dijo el Dios tuyo.
word.latinvulgate: Quia et mulierem derelictam et mœrentem spiritu vocavit te Dominus, et uxorem ab adolescentia abjectam, dixit Deus tuus.
word.italian1927: Poiché l’Eterno ti richiama come una donna abbandonata e afflitta nel suo spirito, come la sposa della giovinezza ch’è stata ripudiata, dice il tuo Dio.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR hat dich zu sich gerufen wie ein verlassenes und von Herzen betrübtes Weib und wie ein junges Weib, das verstoßen ist, spricht dein Gott.
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel te rappelle comme une femme délaissée et au coeur attristé, Comme une épouse de la jeunesse qui a été répudiée, dit ton Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為耶和華召喚你，如同召喚被離棄、心靈憂傷的妻子，就是幼年時所娶卻被棄絕的妻子；這是你的　神說的。
word.korean: 여호와께서 너를 부르시되 마치 버림을 입어 마음에 근심하는 아내 곧 소시에 아내되었다가 버림을 입은 자에게 함같이 하실 것임이니라 네 하나님의 말씀이니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't tinawag ka ng Panginoon na parang asawang kinalimutan namamanglaw sa kalooban, parang asawa ng kabataan, pagka siya'y itinatakuwil, sabi ng iyong Dios.
word.maori: ¶ No te mea kua karanga a Ihowa ki a koe, ano he wahine kua whakarerea, kua pouri te ngakau, ano he hoa wahine o te taitamarikitanga, i te mea kua mahue, e ai ta tou Atua.
word.cebuano: Kay si Jehova nagatawag kanimo ingon sa usa ka asawa nga biniyaan ug sinakit sa espiritu, bisan pa usa ka asawa sa pagkabatan-on, sa diha nga siya gisalikway, nagaingon ang imong Dios.
word.hebrew: ו כי כאשה עזובה ועצובת רוח קראך יהוה ואשת נעורים כי תמאס אמר אלהיך

word.kjv: They say, If a man put away his wife, and she go from him, and become another man's, shall he return unto her again? shall not that land be greatly polluted? but thou hast played the harlot with many lovers; yet return again to me, saith the LORD.
word.thailand: "เขาทั้งหลายว่า `ถ้าชายคนใดหย่าภรรยาของตนและเธอก็ไปจากเขาเสีย และไปเป็นภรรยาของชายอีกคนหนึ่ง เขาจะกลับไปหาเธอหรือ แผ่นดินนั้นจะไม่โสโครกมากมายหรือ' แต่เจ้าได้เล่นชู้กับคนรักมากมายแล้ว ถึงกระนั้นเจ้าจงกลับมาหาเรา" พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสดังนี้แหละ
word.spanish1909: DICEN: Si alguno dejare su mujer, y yéndose ésta de él se juntare á otro hombre, ¿volverá á ella más? ¿no será tal tierra del todo amancillada? Tú pues has fornicado con muchos amigos; mas vuélvete á mí, dijo Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Vulgo dicitur : Si dimiserit vir uxorem suam, et recedens ab eo duxerit virum alterum, numquid revertetur ad eam ultra ? numquid non polluta et contaminata erit mulier illa ? Tu autem fornicatus es cum amatoribus multis : tamen revertere ad me, dicit Dominus, et ego suscipiam te.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno dice: Se un uomo ripudia la sua moglie e questa se ne va da lui e si marita a un altro, quell’uomo torna egli forse ancora da lei? Il paese stesso non ne sarebb’egli tutto profanato? E tu, che ti sei prostituita con molti amanti, ritorneresti a me? dice l’Eterno.
word.german1912: Und er spricht: Wenn sich ein Mann von seinem Weibe scheidet, und sie zieht von ihm und nimmt einen andern Mann, darf er sie auch wieder annehmen? Ist's nicht also, daß das Land verunreinigt würde? Du aber hast mit vielen Buhlen gehurt; doch komm wieder zu mir; spricht der HERR.
word.french1910: Il dit: Lorsqu'un homme répudie sa femme, Qu'elle le quitte et devient la femme d'un autre, Cet homme retourne-t-il encore vers elle? Le pays même ne serait-il pas souillé? Et toi, tu t'es prostituée à de nombreux amants, Et tu reviendrais à moi! dit l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列行惡不忠耶和華說：“人若是休妻，妻子離開了他，又嫁了別人，前夫怎能與她復合呢？如果復合，那地不是大大玷污了嗎？你曾與許多情人行淫，還想歸向我。”這是耶和華的宣告。
word.korean: 세상에서 말하기를 가령 사람이 그 아내를 버리므로 그가 떠나 타인의 아내가 된다 하자 본부가 그를 다시 받겠느냐 ? 그리하면 그 땅이 크게 더러워지지 않겠느냐 ? 하느니라 나 여호와가 말하노라 네가 많은 무리와 행음하고도 내게로 돌아오려느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Kanilang sinabi, Kung ihiwalay ng lalake ang kaniyang asawa, at siya'y humiwalay sa kaniya, at mapasa ibang lalake, babalik pa baga uli ang lalake sa kaniya? hindi baga lubos na madudumhan ang lupaing yaon? Nguni't ikaw ay nagpatutot sa maraming nangingibig; gayon ma'y manumbalik ka uli sa akin, sabi ng Panginoon.
word.maori: ¶ E korerotia ana, kite whakarerea e te tangata tana wahine, a ka haere atu ia i tona taha, ka riro i te tane ke, e hoki ano ranei ia ki a ia? E kore ianei taua whenua e poke rawa? Ko koe ia kua kairau ki nga hoa tokomaha: na, hoki mai ki ahau, e a i ta Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Sila nanag-ingon: Kong ang usa ka tawo mobiya sa iyang asawa, ug siya molakaw gikan kaniya, ug mahimong asawa sa lain, mobalik ba ang tawo pag-usab kaniya? dili ba kanang yutaa mamahugaw sa hilabihan gayud? apan ikaw nakighilawas uban sa daghang mga hinigugma; bisan pa niini bumalik kamo pag-usab kanako, nagaingo si Jehova.
word.hebrew: א לאמר הן ישלח איש את אשתו והלכה מאתו והיתה לאיש אחר הישוב אליה עוד--הלוא חנוף תחנף הארץ ההיא ואת זנית רעים רבים--ושוב אלי נאם יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: לאמר הן ישלח איש את אשתו והלכה מאתו והיתה לאיש אחר הישוב אליה עוד הלוא חנוף תחנף הארץ ההיא ואת זנית רעים רבים ושוב אלי נאם יהוה׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν ἐξαποστείλῃ ἀνὴρ τὴν γυναῖκα αὐτοῦ καὶ ἀπέλθῃ ἀπ' αὐτοῦ καὶ γένηται ἀνδρὶ ἑτέρῳ μὴ ἀνακάμπτουσα ἀνακάμψει πρὸς αὐτὸν ἔτι οὐ μιαινομένη μιανθήσεται ἡ γυνὴ ἐκείνη καὶ σὺ ἐξεπόρνευσας ἐν ποιμέσιν πολλοῖς καὶ ἀνέκαμπτες πρός με λέγει κύριος

word.kjv: Surely as a wife treacherously departeth from her husband, so have ye dealt treacherously with me, O house of Israel, saith the LORD.

word.spanish1909: Mas como la esposa quiebra la fe de su compañero, así prevaricasteis contra mí, oh casa de Israel, dice Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Sed quomodo si contemnat mulier amatorem suum, sic contempsit me domus Israël, dicit Dominus.
word.italian1927: Ma, proprio come una donna è infedele al suo amante, così voi mi siete stati infedeli, o casa d’Israele! dice l’Eterno.
word.german1912: Aber das Haus Israel achtete mich nicht, gleichwie ein Weib ihren Buhlen nicht mehr achtet, spricht der HERR.
word.french1910: Mais, comme une femme est infidèle à son amant, Ainsi vous m'avez été infidèles, maison d'Israël, Dit l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列家啊！妻子怎樣行奸詐對丈夫不忠，你也照樣以奸詐待我。’”這是耶和華的宣告。
word.korean: 그런데 이스라엘 족속아 ! 마치 아내가 그 남편을 속이고 떠남같이 너희가 정녕히 나를 속였느니라 여호와의 말이니라
word.tagalog: Tunay na kung paanong humihiwalay na may pagtataksil ang babae sa kaniyang asawa, gayon kayo nagsigawang may kataksilan sa akin, Oh sangbahayan ni Israel, sabi ng Panginoon.

word.cebuano: Sa pagkatinuod ingon nga ang usa ka maluibon nga asawa mobiya sa iyang bana, mao man kamo nagaluib kanako, Oh balay sa Israel, nagaingon si Jehova.

word.kjv: They were as fed horses in the morning: every one neighed after his neighbour's wife.

word.spanish1909: Como caballos bien hartos fueron á la mañana, cada cual relinchaba á la mujer de su prójimo.
word.latinvulgate: Equi amatores et emissarii facti sunt : unusquisque ad uxorem proximi sui hinniebat.
word.italian1927: Sono come tanti stalloni ben pasciuti ed ardenti; ognun d’essi nitrisce dietro la moglie del prossimo.
word.german1912: Ein jeglicher wiehert nach seines Nächsten Weib wie die vollen, müßigen Hengste.
word.french1910: Semblables à des chevaux bien nourris, qui courent çà et là, Ils hennissent chacun après la femme de son prochain.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們像飽食的馬，情慾奔放，各向別人的妻子嘶叫。

word.tagalog: Sila'y parang pinakaing mga kabayong pagalagala: bawa't isa'y humalinghing sa asawa ng kaniyang kapuwa.

word.cebuano: Sila sama sa linalogan nga mga kabayo nga mingsalaag sa bisan diin nga dapit; ang tagsatagsa nagabahihi sunod sa asawa sa iyang isigkatawo.

word.kjv: Therefore I am full of the fury of the LORD; I am weary with holding in: I will pour it out upon the children abroad, and upon the assembly of young men together: for even the husband with the wife shall be taken, the aged with him that is full of days.
word.thailand: เพราะฉะนั้น ข้าพเจ้าจึงมีพระพิโรธของพระเยโฮวาห์เต็มไปหมด ข้าพเจ้าจะเก็บไว้อีกไม่ไหวแล้ว "เราจะเทออกรดเด็กๆที่ตามถนน และรดพวกหนุ่มๆที่ชุมนุมกันอยู่ด้วย ทั้งสามีและภรรยาก็จะต้องเอาไป ทั้งคนแก่และคนชราด้วย
word.spanish1909: Por tanto estoy lleno de saña de Jehová, trabajado he por contenerme; derramaréla sobre los niños en la calle, y sobre la reunión de los jóvenes juntamente; porque el marido también será preso con la mujer, el viejo con el lleno de días.
word.latinvulgate: Idcirco furore Domini plenus sum, laboravi sustinens. Effunde super parvulum foris, et super consilium juvenum simul : vir enim cum muliere capietur, senex cum pleno dierum.
word.italian1927: Ma io son pieno del furore dell’Eterno; sono stanco di contenermi. Riversalo ad un tempo sui bambini per la strada e sulle adunate dei giovani; poiché il marito e la moglie, il vecchio e l’uomo carico d’anni saranno tutti presi.
word.german1912: Darum bin ich von des HERRN Drohen so voll, daß ich's nicht lassen kann. Schütte es aus über die Kinder auf der Gasse und über die Mannschaft im Rat miteinander; denn es sollen beide, Mann und Weib, Alte und der Wohlbetagte, gefangen werden.
word.french1910: Je suis plein de la fureur de l'Eternel, je ne puis la contenir. Répands-la sur l'enfant dans la rue, Et sur les assemblées des jeunes gens. Car l'homme et la femme seront pris, Le vieillard et celui qui est chargé de jours.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因此，我心裡充滿耶和華的忿怒，無法容忍。“你要把我的忿怒向街上的孩童傾倒，又傾在聯群集結的年輕人身上。夫妻一起被捉住，年老的、壽高的也不例外。
word.korean: 그러므로 여호와의 분노가 내게 가득하여 참기 어렵도다 그것을 거리에 있는 아이들과 모인 청년들에게 부으리니 지아비와 지어미와 노인과 늙은이가 다 잡히리로다
word.tagalog: Kaya't ako'y puspus ng kapusukan ng Panginoon; ako'y pagod na ng pagpipigil ko: ibuhos sa mga bata sa lansangan, at sa kapulungan ng mga binata na magkakasama: sapagka't gayon din ang lalake sangpu ng asawa ay mahuhuli, ang matanda sangpu niya na puspus ng mga kaarawan.
word.maori: Na, ki tonu ahau i te riri o Ihowa; ruha iho ahau i te koromaki: ringihia ki runga ki te kohungahunga i te ara, ki te whakaminenga ano o nga taitamariki, hui katoa: no te mea ka hopukia te tane raua ko te wahine, te koroheke raua ko te tangata k ua maha ona ra.
word.cebuano: Busa ako napuno sa kaligutgut ni Jehova: gikapuyan na ako sa pagbadlong niana: sa tingub ibubo kini sa ibabaw sa mga kabataan sa kadalanan ug ibabaw sa mga batan-ong lalake; kay bisan ang bana uban sa asawa pagakuhaon, ang tigulang uban kaniya nga hupong sa mga adlaw.
word.hebrew: יא ואת חמת יהוה מלאתי נלאיתי הכיל--שפך על עולל בחוץ ועל סוד בחורים יחדו  כי גם איש עם אשה ילכדו זקן עם מלא ימים

word.kjv: Thou shalt not take thee a wife, neither shalt thou have sons or daughters in this place.

word.german1912: Du sollst kein Weib nehmen und weder Söhne noch Töchter zeugen an diesem Ort.
word.french1910: Tu ne prendras point de femme, Et tu n'auras dans ce lieu ni fils ni filles.
word.chinesencvtraditional: “在這地方你不可娶妻，不可生兒育女。”
word.korean: 너는 이 땅에서 아내를 취하지 말며 자녀를 두지 말지니라

word.kjv: And hath not eaten upon the mountains, neither hath lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, neither hath defiled his neighbour's wife, neither hath come near to a menstruous woman,

word.spanish1909: Que no comiere sobre los montes, ni alzare sus ojos á los ídolos de la casa de Israel, ni violare la mujer de su prójimo, ni llegare á la mujer menstruosa,
word.latinvulgate: in montibus non comederit, et oculos suos non levaverit ad idola domus Israël : et uxorem proximi sui non violaverit, et ad mulierem menstruatam non accesserit :
word.italian1927: se non mangia sui monti e non alza gli occhi verso gli idoli della casa d’Israele, se non contamina la moglie del suo prossimo, se non s’accosta a donna mentre è impura,

word.korean: 산 위에서 제물을 먹지 아니하며 이스라엘 족속의 우상에게 눈을 들지 아니하며 이웃의 아내를 더럽히지 아니하며 월경 중에 있는 여인을 가까이 하지 아니하며
word.tagalog: At hindi kumain sa mga bundok, o itinaas man ang kaniyang mga mata sa mga diosdiosan ng sangbahayan ni Israel, o nadumhan man ang asawa ng kaniyang kapuwa, o lumapit man sa isang babae na may kapanahunan:
word.maori: Ki te mea kihai ia i kai ki runga ki nga maunga, kihai ona kanohi i anga ake ki nga whakapakoko o te whare o Iharaira, ki te mea kihai i poke i a ia te wahine a tona hoa, a kihai ia i whakatata ki te wahine e paheke ana;
word.cebuano: Ug wala makakaon sa ibabaw sa kabukiran, lni makayahat sa iyang mga mata ngadto sa mga dios-dios sa balay sa Israel, ni makahugaw sa asawa sa iyang isigkatawo, ni makaduol sa usa ka babaye nga anaa pa sa iyang kinaiya nga binulan,
word.hebrew: ו אל ההרים לא אכל ועיניו לא נשא אל גלולי בית ישראל ואת אשת רעהו לא טמא ואל אשה נדה לא יקרב
word.hebrewmodern: אל ההרים לא אכל ועיניו לא נשא אל גלולי בית ישראל ואת אשת רעהו לא טמא ואל אשה נדה לא יקרב׃
word.greekot: ἐπὶ τῶν ὀρέων οὐ φάγεται καὶ τοὺς ὀφθαλμοὺς αὐτοῦ οὐ μὴ ἐπάρῃ πρὸς τὰ ἐνθυμήματα οἴκου ισραηλ καὶ τὴν γυναῖκα τοῦ πλησίον αὐτοῦ οὐ μὴ μιάνῃ καὶ πρὸς γυναῖκα ἐν ἀφέδρῳ οὖσαν οὐ προσεγγιεῖ

word.kjv: And that doeth not any of those duties, but even hath eaten upon the mountains, and defiled his neighbour's wife,
word.thailand: ผู้มิได้กระทำตามหน้าที่เหล่านี้ แต่รับประทานบนภูเขา กระทำให้ภรรยาของเพื่อนบ้านมลทิน
word.spanish1909: Y que no haga las otras; antes comiere sobre los montes, ó violare la mujer de su prójimo,
word.latinvulgate: et hæc quidem omnia non facientem, sed in montibus comedentem, et uxorem proximi sui polluentem :
word.italian1927: (cose che il padre non commette affatto), e mangia sui monti, e contamina la moglie del suo prossimo,
word.german1912: und der andern Stücke keins tut, sondern auf den Bergen isset und seines Nächsten Weib befleckt,
word.french1910: si ce fils n'imite en rien la conduite de son père, s'il mange sur les montagnes, s'il déshonore la femme de son prochain,
word.chinesencvtraditional: （雖然他父親並沒有作這樣的事）：他在山上吃祭肉，又玷污鄰舍的妻子；
word.korean: 산 위에서 제물을 먹거나 이웃의 아내를 더럽히거나
word.tagalog: At hindi gumagawa ng alin man sa mga katungkulang yaon, kundi kumain nga sa mga bundok, at nadumhan ang asawa ng kaniyang kapuwa,
word.maori: Ka kore ano e mahi i tetahi o enei mea pai, engari kua kai ki runga ki nga maunga, kua whakapoke i te wahine a tona hoa,
word.cebuano: Ug wala magabuhat sa bisan mausa nianang mga katungdanan , kondili nagkaon hinoon sa ibabaw sa kabukiran, ug naghugaw sa asawa sa iyang isigkatawo,
word.hebrew: יא והוא את כל אלה לא עשה--כי גם אל ההרים אכל ואת אשת רעהו טמא
word.hebrewmodern: והוא את כל אלה לא עשה כי גם אל ההרים אכל ואת אשת רעהו טמא׃
word.greekot: ἐν τῇ ὁδῷ τοῦ πατρὸς αὐτοῦ τοῦ δικαίου οὐκ ἐπορεύθη ἀλλὰ καὶ ἐπὶ τῶν ὀρέων ἔφαγεν καὶ τὴν γυναῖκα τοῦ πλησίον αὐτοῦ ἐμίανεν

word.kjv: That hath not eaten upon the mountains, neither hath lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, hath not defiled his neighbour's wife,
word.thailand: มิได้รับประทานบนภูเขา หรือเงยหน้าขึ้นนมัสการรูปเคารพแห่งวงศ์วานอิสราเอล มิได้กระทำให้ภรรยาของเพื่อนบ้านมลทิน
word.spanish1909: No comiere sobre los montes, ni alzare sus ojos á los ídolos de la casa de Israel; la mujer de su prójimo no violare,
word.latinvulgate: super montes non comederit, et oculos suos non levaverit ad idola domus Israël, et uxorem proximi sui non violaverit :
word.italian1927: non mangia sui monti, non alza gli occhi verso gli idoli della casa d’Israele, non contamina la moglie del suo prossimo,
word.german1912: ißt nicht auf den Bergen, hebt seine Augen nicht auf zu den Götzen des Hauses Israel, befleckt nicht seines Nächsten Weib,
word.french1910: si ce fils ne mange pas sur les montagnes et ne lève pas les yeux vers les idoles de la maison d'Israël, s'il ne déshonore pas la femme de son prochain,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他不在山上吃祭肉，眼目不仰望以色列家的偶像，不玷污鄰舍的妻子；
word.korean: 산 위에서 제물을 먹지도 아니하며 이스라엘 족속의 우상에게 눈을 들지도 아니하며 이웃의 아내를 더럽히지도 아니하며
word.tagalog: Na hindi kumain sa mga bundok, o itinaas man ang kaniyang mga mata sa mga diosdiosan ng sangbahayan ni Israel; hindi nadumhan ang asawa ng kaniyang kapuwa,
word.maori: Kahore ia e kai ki runga ki nga maunga, kahore hoki ona kanohi e anga ki nga whakapakoko o te whare o Iharaira, kahore e whakapokea e ia te wahine a tona hoa,
word.cebuano: Nga wala magkaon sa ibabaw sa kabukiran, ni makayahat sa iyang mga mata ngadto sa mga dios-dios sa balay sa Israel, wala maghugaw sa asawa sa iyang isigkatawo,
word.hebrew: טו על ההרים לא אכל ועיניו לא נשא אל גלולי בית ישראל את אשת רעהו לא טמא
word.hebrewmodern: על ההרים לא אכל ועיניו לא נשא אל גלולי בית ישראל את אשת רעהו לא טמא׃
word.greekot: ἐπὶ τῶν ὀρέων οὐ βέβρωκεν καὶ τοὺς ὀφθαλμοὺς αὐτοῦ οὐκ ἔθετο εἰς τὰ ἐνθυμήματα οἴκου ισραηλ καὶ τὴν γυναῖκα τοῦ πλησίον αὐτοῦ οὐκ ἐμίανεν

word.kjv: And one hath committed abomination with his neighbour's wife; and another hath lewdly defiled his daughter in law; and another in thee hath humbled his sister, his father's daughter.
word.thailand: คนหนึ่งกระทำการอันน่าสะอิดสะเอียนกับภรรยาของเพื่อนบ้าน อีกคนหนึ่งกระทำให้ลูกสะใภ้ของตนเป็นมลทินอย่างชั่วช้าลามก และอีกคนหนึ่งในพวกเจ้ากระทำหยามเกียรติน้องสาวของเขาเอง คือลูกสาวของบิดาของตน
word.spanish1909: Y cada uno hizo abominación con la mujer de su prójimo; y cada uno contaminó su nuera torpemente; y cada uno forzó en ti á su hermana, hija de su padre.
word.latinvulgate: et unusquisque in uxorem proximi sui operatus est abominationem, et socer nurum suam polluit nefarie ; frater sororem suam, filiam patris sui, oppressit in te.
word.italian1927: in te l’uno commette abominazione con la moglie del suo prossimo, l’altro contamina d’incesto la sua nuora, l’altro violenta la sua sorella, figliuola di suo padre.
word.german1912: und treiben untereinander, Freund mit Freundes Weibe, Greuel; sie schänden ihre eigene Schwiegertochter mit allem Mutwillen; sie notzüchtigen ihre eigenen Schwestern, ihres Vaters Töchter;
word.french1910: Au milieu de toi, chacun se livre à des abominations avec la femme de son prochain, chacun se souille par l'inceste avec sa belle-fille, chacun déshonore sa soeur, fille de son père.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在你裡面，這人與鄰舍的妻子行可憎的事；那人行淫亂，玷污自己的兒媳；還有人污辱自己的同胞姊妹。
word.korean: 혹은 그 이웃의 아내와 가증한 일을 행하였으며 혹은 그 며느리를 더럽혀 음행하였으며 네 가운데 혹은 그 자매 곧 아비의 딸과 구합하였으며
word.tagalog: At ang isa'y gumawa ng kasuklamsuklam sa asawa ng kaniyang kapuwa; at ang isa'y gumawa ng kahalayhalay sa kaniyang manugang na babae; at sa iyo'y sinipingan ng isa ang kaniyang kapatid na babae na anak ng kaniyang ama.
word.maori: He mahi whakarihariha ano ta tetahi ki te wahine a tona hoa; ko ta tetahi whakapokea iho, puremutia iho tana hunaonga; ko ta tetahi i roto i a koe, he whakaiti i tona tuahine, i te tamahine a tona papa.
word.cebuano: Ug adunay nakahimo mga dulumtanan uban sa asawa sa iyang isig-katawo; ug adunay naghugaw sa dakung kaulag sa iyang binalaye; ug diha kanimo adunay nagpakaulaw sa iyang igsoong babaye, ang anak nga babaye sa iyang amahan.
word.hebrew: יא ואיש את אשת רעהו עשה תועבה ואיש את כלתו טמא בזמה ואיש את אחתו בת אביו ענה בך
word.hebrewmodern: ואיש את אשת רעהו עשה תועבה ואיש את כלתו טמא בזמה ואיש את אחתו בת אביו ענה בך׃
word.greekot: ἕκαστος τὴν γυναῖκα τοῦ πλησίον αὐτοῦ ἠνομοῦσαν καὶ ἕκαστος τὴν νύμφην αὐτοῦ ἐμίαινεν ἐν ἀσεβείᾳ καὶ ἕκαστος τὴν ἀδελφὴν αὐτοῦ θυγατέρα τοῦ πατρὸς αὐτοῦ ἐταπείνουν ἐν σοί

word.kjv: So I spake unto the people in the morning: and at even my wife died; and I did in the morning as I was commanded.
word.thailand: ดังนั้นข้าพเจ้าจึงพูดกับประชาชนตอนเช้า และภรรยาของข้าพเจ้าก็สิ้นชีวิตตอนเย็น รุ่งเช้าขึ้นข้าพเจ้าก็กระทำอย่างที่ข้าพเจ้ารับพระบัญชา
word.spanish1909: Y hablé al pueblo por la mañana, y á la tarde murió mi mujer: y á la mañana hice como me fué mandado.
word.latinvulgate: Locutus sum ergo ad populum mane, et mortua est uxor mea vespere : fecique mane sicut præceperat mihi.
word.italian1927: La mattina parlai al popolo, e la sera mi morì la moglie; e la mattina dopo feci come mi era stato comandato.
word.german1912: Und da ich des Morgens früh zum Volk geredet hatte, starb mir am Abend mein Weib. Und ich tat des andern Morgens, wie mir befohlen war.
word.french1910: J'avais parlé au peuple le matin, et ma femme mourut le soir. Le lendemain matin, je fis ce qui m'avait été ordonné.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是我在早上對眾人說了這事，晚上我的妻子就死了；次日早晨我就照著所吩咐我的行了。
word.korean: 내가 아침에 백성에게 고하였더니 저녁에 내 아내가 죽기로 아침에 내가 받은 명령대로 행하매
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y nagsalita ako sa bayan nang kinaumagahan; at sa kinahapunan ay namatay ang aking asawa; at aking ginawa nang kinaumagahan ang gaya ng iniutos sa akin.
word.maori: Heoi i korero ahau ki te iwi i te ata; a i te ahiahi ka mate toku hoa wahine: na i te ata ka meatia e ahau te mea i whakahaua ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Busa ako misulti sa katawohan sa pagkabuntag; ug sa pagkagabii ang akong asawa namatay; ug gihimo ko niadtong butanga ingon sa gisuso kanako.
word.hebrew: יח ואדבר אל העם בבקר ותמת אשתי בערב ואעש בבקר כאשר צויתי
word.hebrewmodern: ואדבר אל העם בבקר ותמת אשתי בערב ואעש בבקר כאשר צויתי׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐλάλησα πρὸς τὸν λαὸν τὸ πρωὶ ὃν τρόπον ἐνετείλατό μοι καὶ ἀπέθανεν ἡ γυνή μου ἑσπέρας καὶ ἐποίησα τὸ πρωὶ ὃν τρόπον ἐπετάγη μοι

word.kjv: Ye stand upon your sword, ye work abomination, and ye defile every one his neighbour's wife: and shall ye possess the land?
word.thailand: เจ้ายืนอยู่ด้วยดาบของเจ้า เจ้ากระทำการอันน่าสะอิดสะเอียน และเจ้าทุกคนได้กระทำให้ภรรยาของเพื่อนบ้านเป็นมลทิน แล้วเจ้าจะเอากรรมสิทธิ์ที่ดินนี้หรือ
word.spanish1909: Estuvisteis sobre vuestras espadas, hicisteis abominación, y contaminasteis cada cual la mujer de su prójimo: ¿y habréis de poseer la tierra?
word.latinvulgate: stetistis in gladiis vestris, fecistis abominationes, et unusquisque uxorem proximi sui polluit : et terram hæreditate possidebitis ?
word.italian1927: Voi v’appoggiate sulla vostra spada, commettete abominazioni, ciascun di voi contamina la moglie del prossimo, e possedereste il paese?
word.german1912: Ja, ihr fahret immer fort mit Morden und übet Greuel, und einer schändet dem andern sein Weib; und ihr meint, ihr wollt das Land besitzen?
word.french1910: Vous vous appuyez sur votre épée, vous commettez des abominations, chacun de vous déshonore la femme de son prochain. Et vous posséderiez le pays!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們倚仗自己的刀劍，行可憎惡的事，人人玷污鄰舍的妻子，你們還可以得這地為業嗎？’
word.korean: 너희가 칼을 믿어 가증한 일을 행하며 각기 이웃의 아내를 더럽히니 그 땅이 너희의 기업이 될까보냐 하고
word.tagalog: Kayo'y nagsisitayo sa inyong tabak, kayo'y nagsisigawa ng kasuklamsuklam, at nanirang puri bawa't isa sa inyo ng asawa ng kaniyang kapuwa: at inyo bagang aariin ang lupain?
word.maori: Ko to koutou turanga ko a koutou hoari, e mahia ana e koutou te mea whakarihariha, e whakapokea ana e koutou te wahine a tona hoa, a tona hoa: a e mau ranei te whenua i a koutou?
word.cebuano: Kamo nanagsalig sa inyong pinuti, kamo nagbuhat sa dulumtanan, ug naghugaw kamong tanan sa asawa sa tagsatagsa ninyo ka isigkatawo: ug magpanag-iya ba diay kamo sa yuta?
word.hebrew: כו עמדתם על חרבכם עשיתן תועבה ואיש את אשת רעהו טמאתם והארץ תירשו  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: עמדתם על חרבכם עשיתן תועבה ואיש את אשת רעהו טמאתם והארץ תירשו׃
word.greekot: ζῶ ἐγώ εἰ μὴν οἱ ἐν ταῖς ἠρημωμέναις μαχαίρᾳ πεσοῦνται καὶ οἱ ἐπὶ προσώπου τοῦ πεδίου τοῖς θηρίοις τοῦ ἀγροῦ δοθήσονται εἰς κατάβρωμα καὶ τοὺς ἐν ταῖς τετειχισμέναις καὶ τοὺς ἐν τοῖς σπηλαίοις θανάτῳ ἀποκτενῶ

word.kjv: The beginning of the word of the LORD by Hosea. And the LORD said to Hosea, Go, take unto thee a wife of whoredoms and children of whoredoms: for the land hath committed great whoredom, departing from the LORD.
word.thailand: เมื่อพระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสทางโฮเชยาเป็นครั้งแรกนั้น พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสกับโฮเชยาว่า "ไปซี ไปรับหญิงเจ้าชู้มาเป็นภรรยา และเกิดลูกชู้กับนาง เพราะว่าแผ่นดินนี้เล่นชู้อย่างยิ่ง โดยการละทิ้งพระเยโฮวาห์เสีย"
word.spanish1909: El principio de la palabra de Jehová con Oseas. Y dijo Jehová á Oseas: Ve, tómate una mujer fornicaria, é hijos de fornicaciones: porque la tierra se dará á fornicar apartándose de Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Principium loquendi Domino in Osee. Et dixit Dominus ad Osee : Vade, sume tibi uxorem fornicationum, et fac tibi filios fornicationum, quia fornicans fornicabitur terra a Domino.
word.italian1927: Quando l’Eterno cominciò a parlare a Osea, l’Eterno disse ad Osea: "Va’, prenditi per moglie una meretrice, e genera de’ figliuoli di prostituzione; perché il paese si prostituisce, abbandonando l’Eterno".
word.german1912: Da der HERR anfing zu reden durch Hosea, sprach er zu ihm: Gehe hin und nimm ein Hurenweib und Hurenkinder; denn das Land läuft vom HERRN der Hurerei nach.
word.french1910: La première fois que l'Eternel adressa la parole à Osée, l'Eternel dit à Osée: Va, prends une femme prostituée et des enfants de prostitution; car le pays se prostitue, il abandonne l'Eternel!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華初次藉著何西阿說話。耶和華對何西阿說：“你去娶一個像娼妓一樣的女人，生養像娼妓一樣的兒女，因為這地盛行淫亂，離開了耶和華。”
word.korean: 여호와께서 비로소 호세아로 말씀하시니라 여호와께서 호세아에게 이르시되 너는 가서 음란한 아내를 취하여 음란한 자식들을 낳으라 이 나라가 여호와를 떠나 크게 행음함이니라
word.tagalog: Nang unang magsalita ang Panginoon sa pamamagitan ni Oseas, sinabi ng Panginoon kay Oseas, Yumaon ka, magasawa ka sa isang patutot at mga anak sa patutot; sapagka't ang lupain ay gumagawa ng malaking pagpapatutot, na humihiwalay sa Panginoon.
word.maori: ¶ I te korerotanga ai a Ihowa i te tuatahi, he mea korero na Hohea, i mea a Ihowa ki a Hohea, Haere, tangohia tetahi wahine mau, he mea kairau, etahi tamariki ano, he mea na te kairau: he nui hoki te kairautanga i kairau ai te whenua i te mea ka wh akarerea nei a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Sa diha nga si Jehova misulti pag-una pinaagi kang Oseas, si Jehova miingon kang Oseas: Lumakaw ka, pangasawa ug usa ka babaye nga makihilawason ug mga anak sa makihilawason; kay ang yuta nakasala sa dakung pagpakighilawas, nga mibulag kang Jehova.
word.hebrew: ב תחלת דבר יהוה בהושע  {פ}   ויאמר יהוה אל הושע לך קח לך אשת זנונים וילדי זנונים--כי זנה תזנה הארץ מאחרי יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: תחלת דבר יהוה בהושע ויאמר יהוה אל הושע לך קח לך אשת זנונים וילדי זנונים כי זנה תזנה הארץ מאחרי יהוה׃
word.greekot: ἀρχὴ λόγου κυρίου πρὸς ωσηε καὶ εἶπεν κύριος πρὸς ωσηε βάδιζε λαβὲ σεαυτῷ γυναῖκα πορνείας καὶ τέκνα πορνείας διότι ἐκπορνεύουσα ἐκπορνεύσει ἡ γῆ ἀπὸ ὄπισθεν τοῦ κυρίου

word.kjv: Plead with your mother, plead: for she is not my wife, neither am I her husband: let her therefore put away her whoredoms out of her sight, and her adulteries from between her breasts;
word.thailand: จงว่ากล่าวมารดาของเจ้า จงว่ากล่าวเถิด เพราะว่านางไม่ใช่ภรรยาของเรา และเราไม่ใช่สามีของนาง ฉะนั้นให้เธอทิ้งการเล่นชู้เสียจากสายตาของเธอ และทิ้งการล่วงประเวณีเสียจากระหว่างถันของนาง
word.spanish1909: Pleitead con vuestra madre, pleitead; porque ella no es mi mujer, ni yo su marido; quite pues sus fornicaciones de su rostro, y sus adulterios de entre sus pechos;
word.latinvulgate: Judicate matrem vestram, judicate, quoniam ipsa non uxor mea, et ego non vir ejus. Auferat fornicationes suas a facie sua, et adulteria sua de medio uberum suorum ;
word.italian1927: Contendete con vostra madre, contendete! poich’essa non è mia moglie, né io son suo marito! Allontani dalla sua faccia le sue prostituzioni, e i suoi adulteri di fra le sue mammelle;
word.german1912: Sprecht das Urteil über eure Mutter-sie sei nicht mein Weib, und ich will sie nicht haben! -,heißt sie ihre Hurerei von ihrem Angesichte wegtun und ihre Ehebrecherei von ihren Brüsten, {~} {~}
word.french1910: Plaidez, plaidez contre votre mère, car elle n'est point ma femme, et je ne suis point son mari! Qu'elle ôte de sa face ses prostitutions, et de son sein ses adultères!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要與你們的母親爭論，你們要爭論，因為她不是我的妻子，我也不是她的丈夫；好讓她除掉臉上的淫相，和乳間的淫態，
word.korean: 너희 어미와 쟁론하고 쟁론하라 저는 내 아내가 아니요 나는 저의 남편이 아니라 저로 그 얼굴에서 음란을 제하게 하고 그 유방사이에서 음행을 제하게 하라
word.tagalog: Makipagtalo kayo sa inyong ina, makipagtalo kayo; sapagka't siya'y hindi ko asawa, ni ako man ay kaniyang asawa; at alisin niya ang kaniyang pagpapatutot sa kaniyang mukha, at ang kaniyang mga pangangalunya sa pagitan ng kaniyang mga suso;
word.maori: Whakawakia to koutou whaea, whakawakia: ehara hoki ia i te wahine naku, ehara ano ahau i te tahu nana: na kia whakarerea e ia ona moepuku i tona aroaro, ona puremu i waenga i ona u.
word.cebuano: Pakiglalis kamo sa inyong inahan, pakiglalis; kay siya dili akong asawa, ni ako iyang bana; ug ipaputol niya ang iyang mga pagkamakihilawason gikan sa iyang nawong, ug ang iyang mga pagpanapaw gikan sa tunga sa iyang mga dughan:
word.hebrew: ב ונקבצו בני יהודה ובני ישראל יחדו ושמו להם ראש אחד ועלו מן הארץ  כי גדול יום יזרעאל
word.hebrewmodern: ריבו באמכם ריבו כי היא לא אשתי ואנכי לא אישה ותסר זנוניה מפניה ונאפופיה מבין שדיה׃
word.greekot: καὶ συναχθήσονται οἱ υἱοὶ ιουδα καὶ οἱ υἱοὶ ισραηλ ἐπὶ τὸ αὐτὸ καὶ θήσονται ἑαυτοῖς ἀρχὴν μίαν καὶ ἀναβήσονται ἐκ τῆς γῆς ὅτι μεγάλη ἡ ἡμέρα τοῦ ιεζραελ

word.kjv: And Jacob fled into the country of Syria, and Israel served for a wife, and for a wife he kept sheep.
word.thailand: ยาโคบหนีไปยังแผ่นดินอารัม อิสราเอลได้ทำงานเพื่อจะได้ภรรยา ท่านเลี้ยงแกะเพื่อให้ได้ภรรยา
word.spanish1909: (H12-13) Mas Jacob huyó á tierra de Aram, y sirvió Israel por mujer, y por mujer fué pastor.
word.latinvulgate: Fugit Jacob in regionem Syriæ, et servivit Israël in uxorem, et in uxorem servavit.
word.italian1927: (H12-13) Giacobbe fuggì nella pianura d’Aram, e Israele servì per una moglie, e per una moglie si fe’ guardiano di greggi.
word.german1912: (-) Jakob mußte fliehen in das Land Syrien, und Israel mußte um ein Weib dienen, und um ein Weib mußte er hüten.
word.french1910: Jacob s'enfuit au pays d'Aram, Israël servit pour une femme, Et pour une femme il garda les troupeaux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 從前雅各逃到亞蘭地，以色列為得妻子而作工，為得妻子而替人放羊。
word.korean: 옛적에 야곱이 아람 들로 도망하였으며 이스라엘이 아내 얻기 위하여 사람을 섬기며 아내 얻기 위하여 양을 쳤고
word.tagalog: At si Jacob ay tumakas na napatungo sa parang ng Aram, at naglingkod si Israel dahil sa isang asawa, at dahil sa isang asawa ay nagalaga ng mga tupa.
word.maori: I rere ano a Hakopa ki te mara a Arame, a mahi ana a Iharaira hei utu wahine; hei utu wahine i tiaki hipi ai ia.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jacob mikalagiw ngadto sa kapatagan sa Aram, ug si Israel nag-alagad aron makapangasawa, namagbalantay siya sa mga carnero aron makapangasawa.
word.hebrew: יב אם גלעד און אך שוא היו בגלגל שורים זבחו גם מזבחותם כגלים על תלמי שדי
word.hebrewmodern: ויברח יעקב שדה ארם ויעבד ישראל באשה ובאשה שמר׃
word.greekot: εἰ μὴ γαλααδ ἔστιν ἄρα ψευδεῖς ἦσαν ἐν γαλγαλ ἄρχοντες θυσιάζοντες καὶ τὰ θυσιαστήρια αὐτῶν ὡς χελῶναι ἐπὶ χέρσον ἀγροῦ

word.kjv: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Thy wife shall be an harlot in the city, and thy sons and thy daughters shall fall by the sword, and thy land shall be divided by line; and thou shalt die in a polluted land: and Israel shall surely go into captivity forth of his land.
word.thailand: เพราะฉะนั้น พระเยโฮวาห์จึงตรัสดังนี้ว่า `ภรรยาของท่านจะเป็นหญิงโสเภณีที่ในเมือง บุตรชายหญิงของท่านจะล้มลงตายด้วยดาบ และที่ดินของท่านเขาจะขึงเส้นแบ่งออก ตัวท่านเองจะสิ้นชีวิตในแผ่นดินที่ไม่สะอาด และอิสราเอลจะต้องตกไปเป็นเชลยห่างจากแผ่นดินของตนเป็นแน่'"
word.spanish1909: Por tanto, así ha dicho Jehová: Tu mujer fornicará en la ciudad, y tus hijos y tus hijas caerán á cuchillo, y tu tierra será partida por suertes; y tú morirás en tierra inmunda, é Israel será traspasado de su tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Propter hoc hæc dicit Dominus : Uxor tua in civitate fornicabitur, et filii tui et filiæ tuæ in gladio cadent, et humus tua funiculo metietur : et tu in terra polluta morieris, et Israël captivus migrabit de terra sua.
word.italian1927: Perciò così parla l’Eterno: La tua moglie si prostituirà nella città, i tuoi figliuoli e le tue figliuole cadranno per la spada, il tuo paese sarà spartito con la cordicella, e tu stesso morrai su terra impura e Israele sarà certamente menato in cattività, lungi dal suo paese".
word.german1912: Darum spricht der HERR also: Dein Weib wird in der Stadt zur Hure werden, und deine Söhne und Töchter sollen durchs Schwert fallen, und dein Acker soll durch die Schnur ausgeteilt werden; du aber sollst in einem unreinen Lande sterben, und Israel soll aus seinem Lande vertrieben werden.
word.french1910: A cause de cela, voici ce que dit l'Eternel: Ta femme se prostituera dans la ville, tes fils et tes filles tomberont par l'épée, ton champ sera partagé au cordeau; et toi, tu mourras sur une terre impure, et Israël sera emmené captif loin de son pays.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 所以，耶和華這樣說：‘你妻子必在城中作妓女，你的兒女必倒在刀下；你的土地必被人量度瓜分，你自己必死在不潔之地；以色列必被擄，離開本國。’”
word.korean: 여호와께서 말씀하시기를 네 아내는 성읍 중에서 창기가 될 것이요 네 자녀들은 칼에 엎드러지며 네 땅은 줄 띄워 나누일 것이며 너는 더러운 땅에서 죽을 것이요 이스라엘은 정녕 사로잡혀 그 본토에서 떠나리라 하셨느니라
word.tagalog: Kaya't ganito ang sabi ng Panginoon, Ang iyong asawa ay magiging patutot sa bayan, at ang iyong mga anak na lalake at babae ay mangabubuwal sa pamamagitan ng tabak, at ang iyong lupain ay mababahagi sa pamamagitan ng pising panukat; at ikaw ay mamamatay sa isang lupaing marumi, at ang Israel ay walang pagsalang dadalhing bihag mula sa kaniyang lupain.
word.maori: No reira ko te kupu tenei a Ihowa, Tera tau wahine e kairau i roto i te pa, a ka hinga au tama me au tamahine i te hoari, ka wehewehea tou oneone, mea rawa ki te aho; ka mate koe i runga i te oneone poke, ka whakaraua rawatia atu hoki a Iharaira i tona oneone.
word.cebuano: Busa mao kini ang giingon ni Jehova: Ang imong asawa mahimong bigaon diha sa ciudad, ug ang imong mga anak nga lalake ug mga anak nga babaye mangapukan pinaagi sa espada, ug ang ang imong yuta pagabahinon pinaagi sa latid; ug ikaw sa imong kaugalingon mamatay sa yuta nga mahugaw, ug ang Israel sa pagkatinuod bihagon ngadto sa gawas sa iyang yuta.
word.hebrew: יז לכן כה אמר יהוה אשתך בעיר תזנה ובניך ובנתיך בחרב יפלו ואדמתך בחבל תחלק ואתה על אדמה טמאה תמות וישראל גלה יגלה מעל אדמתו  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: לכן כה אמר יהוה אשתך בעיר תזנה ובניך ובנתיך בחרב יפלו ואדמתך בחבל תחלק ואתה על אדמה טמאה תמות וישראל גלה יגלה מעל אדמתו׃
word.greekot: διὰ τοῦτο τάδε λέγει κύριος ἡ γυνή σου ἐν τῇ πόλει πορνεύσει καὶ οἱ υἱοί σου καὶ αἱ θυγατέρες σου ἐν ῥομφαίᾳ πεσοῦνται καὶ ἡ γῆ σου ἐν σχοινίῳ καταμετρηθήσεται καὶ σὺ ἐν γῇ ἀκαθάρτῳ τελευτήσεις ὁ δὲ ισραηλ αἰχμάλωτος ἀχθήσεται ἀπὸ τῆς γῆς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Yet ye say, Wherefore? Because the LORD hath been witness between thee and the wife of thy youth, against whom thou hast dealt treacherously: yet is she thy companion, and the wife of thy covenant.
word.thailand: เจ้าถามว่า "เหตุใดพระองค์จึงไม่รับ" เพราะว่าพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงเป็นพยานระหว่างเจ้ากับภรรยาคนที่เจ้าได้เมื่อหนุ่มนั้น แม้ว่านางเป็นคู่เคียงของเจ้าและเป็นภรรยาของเจ้าตามพันธสัญญา เจ้าก็ทรยศต่อนาง
word.spanish1909: Mas diréis: ¿Por qué? Porque Jehová ha atestiguado entre ti y la mujer de tu mocedad, contra la cual tú has sido desleal, siendo ella tu compañera, y la mujer de tu pacto.
word.latinvulgate: Et dixistis : Quam ob causam ? Quia Dominus testificatus est inter te et uxorem pubertatis tuæ, quam tu despexisti : et hæc particeps tua, et uxor fœderis tui.
word.italian1927: Eppure dite: "Perché?" Perché l’Eterno è testimonio fra te e la moglie della tue giovinezza, verso la quali ti conduci perfidamente, bench’ella sia la tua compagna, la moglie alla quale sei legato da un patto.
word.german1912: Und so sprecht ihr: "Warum das?" Darum daß der HERR zwischen dir und dem Weibe deiner Jugend Zeuge war, die du verachtest, so sie doch deine Gesellin und ein Weib deines Bundes ist.
word.french1910: Et vous dites: Pourquoi?... Parce que l'Eternel a été témoin entre toi et la femme de ta jeunesse, A laquelle tu es infidèle, Bien qu'elle soit ta compagne et la femme de ton alliance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們還問：“為甚麼呢？”因為耶和華在你和你年輕時所娶的妻子中間作證；她是你的伴侶，是你立約的妻子，你竟對她不忠！
word.korean: 너희는 이르기를 어찜이니까 하는도다 이는 너와 너의 어려서 취한 아내 사이에 여호와께서 일찌기 증거하셨음을 인함이니라 그는 네 짝이요 너와 맹약한 아내로되 네가 그에게 궤사를 행하도다
word.tagalog: Gayon ma'y inyong sinasabi, Bakit? Sapagka't ang Panginoon ay naging saksi sa iyo at sa asawa ng iyong kabataan, na ginawan mo ng paglililo, bagaman siya'y iyong kasama, at siyang asawa ng iyong tipan.
word.maori: Heoi e mea na koutou, Na te aha? No te mea he kaiwhakaatu a Ihowa mo tau ki te wahine o tou taitamarikitanga i tinihangatia ra e koe, ahakoa ko ia tou hoa, ko te wahine o tau kawenata.
word.cebuano: Apan kamo nagaingon: Ngano man? Tungod kay si Jehova nagpamatuod sa taliwala nimo ug sa asawa sa imong pagkabatan-on, batok kang kinsa ikaw nagmaluibon, bisan matuod nga siya maoy imong kauban, ug ang asawa sa imong tugon.
word.hebrew: יד ואמרתם על מה  על כי יהוה העיד בינך ובין אשת נעוריך אשר אתה בגדתה בה והיא חברתך ואשת בריתך
word.hebrewmodern: ואמרתם על מה על כי יהוה העיד בינך ובין אשת נעוריך אשר אתה בגדתה בה והיא חברתך ואשת בריתך׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἴπατε ἕνεκεν τίνος ὅτι κύριος διεμαρτύρατο ἀνὰ μέσον σοῦ καὶ ἀνὰ μέσον γυναικὸς νεότητός σου ἣν ἐγκατέλιπες καὶ αὐτὴ κοινωνός σου καὶ γυνὴ διαθήκης σου

word.kjv: And did not he make one? Yet had he the residue of the spirit. And wherefore one? That he might seek a godly seed. Therefore take heed to your spirit, and let none deal treacherously against the wife of his youth.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงทำให้เขาทั้งสองเป็นอันเดียวกันมิใช่หรือ แต่เขายังมีลมปราณแห่งชีวิตอยู่ และทำไมเป็นอันเดียวกัน เพราะพระองค์ทรงประสงค์เชื้อสายที่ตามทางของพระเจ้า ดังนั้นจงเอาใจใส่ต่อจิตวิญญาณของเจ้าให้ดี อย่าให้ผู้ใดทรยศต่อภรรยาคนที่ได้เมื่อหนุ่มนั้น
word.spanish1909: Pues qué ¿no hizo él uno solo aunque tenía la abundancia del espíritu? ¿Y por qué uno? Para que procurara una simiente de Dios. Guardaos pues en vuestros espíritus, y contra la mujer de vuestra mocedad no seáis desleales.
word.latinvulgate: Nonne unus fecit, et residuum spiritus ejus est ? et quid unus quærit, nisi semen Dei ? custodite ergo spiritum vestrum, et uxorem adolescentiæ tuæ noli despicere.
word.italian1927: Ma, direte voi, non ve n’è uno che fece così? E nondimeno, lo spirito rimase in lui. Ma perché quell’uno lo fece? Perché cercava la progenie promessagli da Dio. Badate dunque allo spirito vostro, e niuno agisca perfidamente verso la moglie della sua giovinezza.
word.german1912: Also tat der Eine nicht, und war doch großen Geistes. Was tat aber der Eine? Er suchte den Samen, von Gott verheißen. Darum so sehet euch vor vor eurem Geist und verachte keiner das Weib seiner Jugend.
word.french1910: Nul n'a fait cela, avec un reste de bon sens. Un seul l'a fait, et pourquoi? Parce qu'il cherchait la postérité que Dieu lui avait promise. Prenez donc garde en votre esprit, Et qu'aucun ne soit infidèle à la femme de sa jeunesse!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 一個還有靈性的人，是不會這樣作的。他會作甚麼呢？他會尋求　神的子孫。所以要謹守你們的靈性，不可對年輕時所娶的妻子不忠。
word.korean: 여호와는 영이 유여하실지라도 오직 하나를 짓지 아니하셨느냐 ? 어찌하여 하나만 지으셨느냐 ? 이는 경건한 자손을 얻고자 하심이니라 그러므로 네 심령을 삼가 지켜 어려서 취한 아내에게 궤사를 행치 말지니라
word.tagalog: At di baga siya'y gumawa ng isa, bagaman siya'y may labis na Espiritu? At bakit isa? Kaniyang hinanap ang lahing maka Dios. Kaya't ingatan ninyo ang inyong kalooban, at huwag nang manglilo laban sa asawa ng kaniyang kabataan.
word.maori: He teka ianei kotahi tana i hanga ai, ahakoa i a ia ano te toenga iho o te wairua? A na te aha i kotahi ai? I rapu ia i te uri atua. Na tiakina to koutou wairua, kaua hoki tetahi e tinihanga ki te wahine o tona taitamarikitanga.
word.cebuano: Ug wala ba siya maghimo ug usa, bisan siya adunay nahabilin sa Espiritu? Ug ngano nga usa? Siya nangita ug diosnong kaliwat. Busa magbantay kamo sa inyong espiritu, ug ayaw itugot nga adunay usa nga magbuhat sa pagkamaluibon batok sa asawa sa inyong pagkabatan-on.
word.hebrew: טו ולא אחד עשה ושאר רוח לו ומה האחד מבקש זרע אלהים ונשמרתם ברוחכם ובאשת נעוריך אל יבגד
word.hebrewmodern: ולא אחד עשה ושאר רוח לו ומה האחד מבקש זרע אלהים ונשמרתם ברוחכם ובאשת נעוריך אל יבגד׃
word.greekot: καὶ οὐκ ἄλλος ἐποίησεν καὶ ὑπόλειμμα πνεύματος αὐτοῦ καὶ εἴπατε τί ἄλλο ἀλλ' ἢ σπέρμα ζητεῖ ὁ θεός καὶ φυλάξασθε ἐν τῷ πνεύματι ὑμῶν καὶ γυναῖκα νεότητός σου μὴ ἐγκαταλίπῃς

word.kjv: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;
word.thailand: เจสซีให้กำเนิดบุตรชื่อดาวิดผู้เป็นกษัตริย์ ดาวิดผู้เป็นกษัตริย์ให้กำเนิดบุตรชื่อซาโลมอน เกิดจากนางซึ่งแต่ก่อนเป็นภรรยาของอุรียาห์
word.spanish1909: Y Jessé engendró al rey David: y el rey David engendró á Salomón de la que fué mujer de Urías:
word.latinvulgate: David autem rex genuit Salomonem ex ea quæ fuit Uriæ.
word.italian1927: e Iesse generò Davide, il re. E Davide generò Salomone da quella ch’era stata moglie d’Uria;
word.german1912: Jesse zeugte den König David. Der König David zeugte Salomo von dem Weib des Uria.
word.french1910: Isaï engendra David. Le roi David engendra Salomon de la femme d'Urie;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶西生大衛王。烏利亞的妻子給大衛生了所羅門，
word.korean: 이새는 다윗왕을 낳으니라 다윗은 우리야의 아내에게서 솔로몬을 낳고
word.tagalog: At naging anak ni Jesse ang haring si David; at naging anak ni David si Salomon, doon sa naging asawa ni Urias;
word.maori: Ta Hehe ko Rawiri, ko te kingi; ta Rawiri kingi raua ko te wahine a Uria ko Horomona;
word.cebuano: Ug si Isai nanganak kang David nga hari, ug si David nga hari nanganak kang Salomon sa kanhi naasawa ni Urias;
word.hebrewmodern: וישי הוליד את דוד המלך ודוד המלך הוליד את שלמה מאשת אוריה׃
word.textusreceptus: ιεσσαι δε εγεννησεν τον δαβιδ τον βασιλεα δαβιδ δε ο βασιλευς εγεννησεν τον σολομωντα εκ της του ουριου
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.
word.thailand: แต่เมื่อโยเซฟยังคิดในเรื่องนี้อยู่ ดูเถิด มีทูตสวรรค์ขององค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า มาปรากฏแก่โยเซฟในความฝันว่า "โยเซฟ บุตรดาวิด อย่ากลัวที่จะรับมารีย์มาเป็นภรรยาของเจ้าเลย เพราะว่าผู้ซึ่งปฏิสนธิในครรภ์ของเธอเป็นโดยเดชพระวิญญาณบริสุทธิ์

word.maori: Otiia, he whakaaro kei moepuku, kia rite ma te tane he wahine mana ake, a ma te wahine he tane mana ake.
word.cebuano: Apan tungod sa mga pagpakighilawas, pasagdi nga ang tagsa ka lalake magbaton sa iyang kaugalingong asawa, ug ang tagsa ka babaye nga magbaton sa iyang kaugalingong bana.
word.hebrewmodern: אך מפני הזנות תהי לכל איש אשתו ויהי לכל אשה בעלה׃
word.textusreceptus: δια δε τας πορνειας εκαστος την εαυτου γυναικα εχετω και εκαστη τον ιδιον ανδρα εχετω
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let the husband render unto the wife due benevolence: and likewise also the wife unto the husband.
word.thailand: สามีพึงประพฤติต่อภรรยาตามควร และภรรยาก็พึงประพฤติต่อสามีตามควรเช่นเดียวกัน
word.spanish1909: El marido pague á la mujer la debida benevolencia; y asimismo la mujer al marido.
word.latinvulgate: Uxori vir debitum reddat : similiter autem et uxor viro.
word.italian1927: Il marito renda alla moglie quel che le è dovuto; e lo stesso faccia la moglie verso il marito.
word.german1912: Der Mann leiste dem Weib die schuldige Freundschaft, desgleichen das Weib dem Manne.
word.french1910: Que le mari rende à sa femme ce qu'il lui doit, et que la femme agisse de même envers son mari.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 丈夫對妻子應該盡他的本分，妻子對丈夫也應當這樣。
word.korean: 남편은 그 아내에게 대한 의무를 다하고 아내도 그 남편에게 그렇게 할지라
word.tagalog: Ibigay ng lalake sa asawa ang sa kaniya'y nararapat: at gayon din naman ang babae sa asawa.
word.maori: Kia puta te whakaaro pai o te tane ki te wahine, hei te mea e tika ana: me to te wahine hoki ki te tane.
word.cebuano: Ihatag sa bana ngadto sa iyang asawa ang angay, ug ingon man usab ang asawa ngadto sa bana.
word.hebrewmodern: האיש יקים חובת העונה לאשתו וכמו כן האשה לבעלה׃
word.textusreceptus: τη γυναικι ο ανηρ την οφειλομενην ευνοιαν αποδιδοτω ομοιως δε και η γυνη τω ανδρι
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The wife hath not power of her own body, but the husband: and likewise also the husband hath not power of his own body, but the wife.
word.thailand: ภรรยาไม่มีอำนาจเหนือร่างกายของตน แต่สามีมีอำนาจเหนือร่างกายของภรรยา ทำนองเดียวกันสามีไม่มีอำนาจเหนือร่างกายของตน แต่ภรรยามีอำนาจเหนือร่างกายของสามี
word.spanish1909: La mujer no tiene potestad de su propio cuerpo, sino el marido: é igualmente tampoco el marido tiene potestad de su propio cuerpo, sino la mujer.
word.latinvulgate: Mulier sui corporis potestatem non habet, sed vir. Similiter autem et vir sui corporis potestatem non habet, sed mulier.
word.italian1927: La moglie non ha potestà sul proprio corpo, ma il marito; e nello stesso modo il marito non ha potestà sul proprio corpo, ma la moglie.
word.german1912: Das Weib ist ihres Leibes nicht mächtig, sondern der Mann. Desgleichen der Mann ist seines Leibes nicht mächtig, sondern das Weib.
word.french1910: La femme n'a pas autorité sur son propre corps, mais c'est le mari; et pareillement, le mari n'a pas autorité sur son propre corps, mais c'est la femme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 妻子對自己的身體沒有主權，權在丈夫；照樣，丈夫對自己的身體也沒有主權，權在妻子。
word.korean: 아내가 자기 몸을 주장하지 못하고 오직 그 남편이 하며 남편도 이와 같이 자기 몸을 주장하지 못하고 오직 그 아내가 하나니
word.tagalog: Ang babae ay walang kapangyarihan sa kaniyang sariling katawan, kundi ang asawa: at gayon din naman ang lalake ay walang kapangyarihan sa kaniyang sariling katawan, kundi ang asawa.
word.maori: Ehara te wahine i te rangatira o tona tinana ake, engari te tane: me te tane ano, ehara ia i te rangatira o tona ake tinana, engari te wahine.
word.cebuano: Ang asawa walay kagamhanan sa iyang kaugalingong lawas, kondili ang bana; ug ingon man usab ang bana walay kagamhanan sa iyang kaugalingong lawas, kondili ang asawa.
word.hebrewmodern: האשה איננה שלטת על גופה כי אם בעלה וכמו כן גם האיש איננו שלט על גופו כי אם אשתו׃
word.textusreceptus: η γυνη του ιδιου σωματος ουκ εξουσιαζει αλλ ο ανηρ ομοιως δε και ο ανηρ του ιδιου σωματος ουκ εξουσιαζει αλλ η γυνη
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And unto the married I command, yet not I, but the Lord, Let not the wife depart from her husband:
word.thailand: ส่วนคนที่แต่งงานแล้วข้าพเจ้าขอสั่ง มิใช่ข้าพเจ้าสั่งเอง แต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าทรงบัญชาว่า อย่าให้ภรรยาทิ้งสามี
word.spanish1909: Mas á los que están juntos en matrimonio, denuncio, no yo, sino el Señor: Que la mujer no se aparte del marido;
word.latinvulgate: Iis autem qui matrimonio juncti sunt, præcipio non ego, sed Dominus, uxorem a viro non discedere :
word.italian1927: Ma ai coniugi ordino non io ma il Signore, che la moglie non si separi dal marito,
word.german1912: Den Ehelichen aber gebiete nicht ich, sondern der HERR, daß sich das Weib nicht scheide von dem Manne;
word.french1910: A ceux qui sont mariés, j'ordonne, non pas moi, mais le Seigneur, que la femme ne se sépare point de son mari
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要吩咐已婚的人（其實不是我，而是主吩咐的），妻子不可離開丈夫。
word.korean: 혼인한 자들에게 내가 명하노니 (명하는 자는 내가 아니요 주시라) 여자는 남편에게서 갈리지 말고
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't sa mga may asawa ay aking ipinaguutos, Nguni't hindi ako, kundi ang Panginoon, na ang babae ay huwag humiwalay sa kaniyang asawa.
word.maori: ¶ Ko taku whakahau ia tenei ki te hunga whai hoa, ehara i ahau, engari ko te Ariki, Aua te wahine e mawehe ke i tana tane:
word.cebuano: Apan ako nagasugo sa mga nangaminyo na, dili ako, kondili ang Ginoo: Nga ang asawa dili magbulag gikan sa iyang bana,
word.hebrewmodern: והנה את הנשואים אנכי מצוה ולא אנכי כי אם האדון אשר לא תפרש אשה מבעלה׃
word.textusreceptus: τοις δε γεγαμηκοσιν παραγγελλω ουκ εγω αλλ ο κυριος γυναικα απο ανδρος μη χωρισθηναι
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But and if she depart, let her remain unmarried, or be reconciled to her husband: and let not the husband put away his wife.
word.thailand: แต่ถ้านางทิ้งสามีไปอย่าให้นางไปมีสามีใหม่ หรือไม่ก็ให้นางกลับมาคืนดีกับสามีเก่า และขออย่าให้สามีหย่าร้างภรรยาเลย
word.spanish1909: Y si se apartare, que se quede sin casar, ó reconcíliese con su marido; y que el marido no despida á su mujer.
word.latinvulgate: quod si discesserit, manere innuptam, aut viro suo reconciliari. Et vir uxorem non dimittat.
word.italian1927: (e se mai si separa, rimanga senza maritarsi o si riconcili col marito); e che il marito non lasci la moglie.
word.german1912: so sie sich aber scheidet, daß sie ohne Ehe bleibe oder sich mit dem Manne versöhne; und daß der Mann das Weib nicht von sich lasse.
word.french1910: si elle est séparée, qu'elle demeure sans se marier ou qu'elle se réconcilie avec son mari, et que le mari ne répudie point sa femme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果離開了，就不可再嫁，不然，就要跟丈夫復合。丈夫也不可離棄妻子。
word.korean: (만일 갈릴지라도 그냥 지내든지 다시 그 남편과 화합하든지 하라) 남편도 아내를 버리지 말라
word.tagalog: (Datapuwa't kung siya'y humiwalay, ay manatiling walang asawa, o kaya'y makipagkasundo sa kaniyang asawa); at huwag hiwalayan ng lalake ang kaniyang asawa.
word.maori: Engari, ki te mawehe ia, me noho hoakore, me hohou ranei te rongo ki tana tane: kaua hoki te tane e whakarere i tana wahine.
word.cebuano: (Apan kong ang asawa makigbulag, magpadayon siya sa dili pagminyo; kun makig-uli hinoon siya sa iyang bana), ug nga ang bana dili magbulag sa iyang asawa.
word.hebrewmodern: ואם פרש תפרש ממנו תשב בלא איש או תתרצה לבעלה ואיש אל ישלח את אשתו׃
word.textusreceptus: εαν δε και χωρισθη μενετω αγαμος η τω ανδρι καταλλαγητω και ανδρα γυναικα μη αφιεναι
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But to the rest speak I, not the Lord: If any brother hath a wife that believeth not, and she be pleased to dwell with him, let him not put her away.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าขอกล่าวแก่คนอื่นๆนอกจากพวกนี้ (องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้ามิได้ตรัส) ว่า ถ้าพี่น้องคนใดมีภรรยาที่ไม่เชื่อและนางพอใจที่จะอยู่กับสามี สามีก็ไม่ควรหย่านาง
word.spanish1909: Y á los demás yo digo, no el Señor: si algún hermano tiene mujer infiel, y ella consiente en habitar con él, no la despida.
word.latinvulgate: Nam ceteris ego dico, non Dominus. Si quis frater uxorem habet infidelem, et hæc consentit habitare cum illo, non dimittat illam.
word.italian1927: Ma agli altri dico io, non il Signore: Se un fratello ha una moglie non credente ed ella è contenta di abitar con lui, non la lasci;
word.german1912: Den andern aber sage ich, nicht der HERR: So ein Bruder ein ungläubiges Weib hat, und sie läßt es sich gefallen, bei ihm zu wohnen, der scheide sich nicht von ihr.
word.french1910: Aux autres, ce n'est pas le Seigneur, c'est moi qui dis: Si un frère a une femme non-croyante, et qu'elle consente à habiter avec lui, qu'il ne la répudie point;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要對其餘的人說（是我說的，不是主說的），倘若某弟兄有不信的妻子，而她也情願和他住在一起，他就不要離棄她。
word.korean: 그 남은 사람들에게 내가 말하노니(이는 주의 명령이 아니라)만일 어떤 형제에게 믿지 아니하는 아내가 있어 남편과 함께 살기를 좋아하거든 저를 버리지 말며
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't sa iba, ay ako ang nagsasabi, hindi ang Panginoon: Kung ang sinomang kapatid na lalake ay may asawang hindi sumasampalataya, at kung kalooban niyang makipamahay sa kaniya, ay huwag niyang hiwalayan.
word.maori: Ki era atu ia ko taku kupu tenei, ehara i te Ariki: Ki te mea he wahine kore whakapono ta tetahi o nga teina, a ka whakaae taua wahine kia noho tahi raua, kaua ia e whakarerea e ia.
word.cebuano: Apan mahitungod sa uban nagaingon ako, dili ang Ginoo: Kong adunay igsoon nga may asawa nga dili matinohoon, ug miuyon siya nga makigloon kaniya, dili niya pagbiyaan siya.
word.hebrewmodern: והנה אל האחרים אמר אנכי ולא האדון כי תהיה לאח אשה אשר איננה מאמנת ורצונה לשבת עמו לא יעזבנה׃
word.textusreceptus: τοις δε λοιποις εγω λεγω ουχ ο κυριος ει τις αδελφος γυναικα εχει απιστον και αυτη συνευδοκει οικειν μετ αυτου μη αφιετω αυτην
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For the unbelieving husband is sanctified by the wife, and the unbelieving wife is sanctified by the husband: else were your children unclean; but now are they holy.
word.thailand: ด้วยว่าสามีที่ไม่เชื่อนั้นได้รับการทรงชำระให้บริสุทธิ์ทางภรรยา และภรรยาที่ไม่เชื่อก็ได้รับการทรงชำระให้บริสุทธิ์ทางสามี มิฉะนั้นลูกของท่านก็เป็นมลทิน แต่บัดนี้ลูกเหล่านั้นก็บริสุทธิ์
word.spanish1909: Porque el marido infiel es santificado en la mujer, y la mujer infiel en el marido: pues de otra manera vuestros hijos serían inmundos; empero ahora son santos.
word.latinvulgate: sanctificatus est enim vir infidelis per mulierem fidelem, et sanctificata est mulier infidelis per virum fidelem : alioquin filii vestri immundi essent, nunc autem sancti sunt.
word.italian1927: perché il marito non credente è santificato nella moglie, e la moglie non credente è santificata nel marito credente; altrimenti i vostri figliuoli sarebbero impuri, mentre ora sono santi.
word.german1912: Denn der ungläubige Mann ist geheiligt durchs Weib, und das ungläubige Weib ist geheiligt durch den Mann. Sonst wären eure Kinder unrein; nun aber sind sie heilig.
word.french1910: Car le mari non-croyant est sanctifié par la femme, et la femme non-croyante est sanctifiée par le frère; autrement, vos enfants seraient impurs, tandis que maintenant ils sont saints.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為不信的丈夫因著妻子成為聖潔，不信的妻子也因著那個弟兄成為聖潔了。不然，你們的兒女就是不潔淨的，但現在他們都是聖潔的了。
word.korean: 믿지 아니하는 남편이 아내로 인하여 거룩하게 되고 믿지 아니하는 아내가 남편으로 인하여 거룩하게 되나니 그렇지 아니하면 너희 자녀도 깨끗지 못하니라 그러나 이제 거룩하니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang lalaking hindi sumasampalataya ay nagiging banal sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang asawa, at ang babaing hindi sumasampalataya ay nagiging banal sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang asawa: sa ibang paraa'y ang inyong mga anak ay nangagkaroon ng kapintasan; nguni't ngayo'y mga banal.
word.maori: No te mea e whakatapua ana te tane whakaponokore e te wahine, e whakatapua ana hoki te wahine whakaponokore e te tane: me he kahore, kua poke a korua tamariki, tena ko tenei he tapu ratou.
word.cebuano: Kay ang bana nga dili matinohoon, ginabalaan diha sa asawa; ug ang asawa nga dili matinohoon, ginabalaan diha sa igsoon nga lalake: kay sa lain nga paagi, ang inyong mga bata mga dili putli, apan karon mga balaan sila.
word.hebrewmodern: כי האיש אשר איננו מאמין מקדש הוא באשה והאשה אשר איננה מאמנת מקדשת היא באיש שאם לא כן יהיו בניכם טמאים אמנם עתה קדושים המה׃
word.textusreceptus: ηγιασται γαρ ο ανηρ ο απιστος εν τη γυναικι και ηγιασται η γυνη η απιστος εν τω ανδρι επει αρα τα τεκνα υμων ακαθαρτα εστιν νυν δε αγια εστιν
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For what knowest thou, O wife, whether thou shalt save thy husband? or how knowest thou, O man, whether thou shalt save thy wife?
word.thailand: โอ ท่านผู้เป็นภรรยา ไฉนท่านจะรู้ได้ว่าท่านจะช่วยสามีให้รอดได้หรือไม่ โอ ท่านผู้เป็นสามี ไฉนท่านจะรู้ได้ว่าท่านจะช่วยภรรยาให้รอดได้หรือไม่
word.spanish1909: Porque ¿de dónde sabes, oh mujer, si quizá harás salva á tu marido? ¿ó de dónde sabes, oh marido, si quizá harás salvo á tu mujer?
word.latinvulgate: Unde enim scis mulier, si virum salvum facies ? aut unde scis vir, si mulierem salvam facies ?
word.italian1927: perché, o moglie, che sai tu se salverai il marito? Ovvero tu, marito, che sai tu se salverai la moglie?
word.german1912: Denn was weißt du, Weib, ob du den Mann wirst selig machen? Oder du, Mann, was weißt du, ob du das Weib wirst selig machen?
word.french1910: Car que sais-tu, femme, si tu sauveras ton mari? Ou que sais-tu, mari, si tu sauveras ta femme?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你這作妻子的，你怎麼知道不能救你的丈夫呢？你這作丈夫的，你怎麼知道不能救你的妻子呢？
word.korean: 아내된 자여 네가 남편을 구원할는지 어찌 알 수 있으며 남편된 자여 네가 네 아내를 구원할는지 어찌 알 수 있으리요
word.tagalog: Sapagka't paanong malalaman mo, Oh babae, kung maililigtas mo ang iyong asawa? o paanong malalaman mo, Oh lalake, kung maililigtas mo ang iyong asawa?
word.maori: Ma te aha koe e mohio ai, e tai, ka ora ranei i a koe tau tane? a koe ranei, e te tane, ma te aha ka mohio ai, ka ora i a koe tau wahine?
word.cebuano: Kay unsaon mo pagkasayud, O asawa, kong maluwas mo ba ang imong bana? Kun unsaon mo pagkasayud, O bana, kong maluwas mo ba ang imong asawa?
word.hebrewmodern: כי מה תדעי את האשה אם תושיעי את האיש ומה תדע אתה האיש אם תושיע את האשה׃
word.textusreceptus: τι γαρ οιδας γυναι ει τον ανδρα σωσεις η τι οιδας ανερ ει την γυναικα σωσεις
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Art thou bound unto a wife? seek not to be loosed. Art thou loosed from a wife? seek not a wife.
word.thailand: ท่านมีภรรยาแล้วหรือ อย่าหาช่องที่จะหย่าภรรยาเลย ท่านหย่าจากภรรยาแล้วหรือ อย่าหาภรรยาเลย
word.spanish1909: ¿Estás ligado á mujer? no procures soltarte. ¿Estáis suelto de mujer? no procures mujer.
word.latinvulgate: Alligatus es uxori ? noli quærere solutionem. Solutus es ab uxore ? noli quærere uxorem.
word.italian1927: Sei tu legato a una moglie? Non cercar d’esserne sciolto. Sei tu sciolto da moglie? Non cercar moglie.
word.german1912: Bist du an ein Weib gebunden, so suche nicht los zu werden; bist du los vom Weibe, so suche kein Weib.
word.french1910: Es-tu lié à une femme, ne cherche pas à rompre ce lien; n'es-tu pas lié à une femme, ne cherche pas une femme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你已經有了妻子嗎？就不要想擺脫。你還沒有妻子嗎？就不要去找妻子。
word.korean: 네가 아내에게 매였느냐 놓이기를 구하지 말며 아내에게서 놓였느냐 아내를 구하지 말라
word.tagalog: Natatali ka ba sa asawa? huwag mong pagsikapang ikaw ay makakalag. Ikaw baga'y kalag sa asawa? huwag kang humanap ng asawa.
word.maori: Kua herea koe ki te wahine? kaua e whai kia wetekia. Ka oti koe te wewete i te wahine? kaua e whaia he wahine.
word.cebuano: Ginapus ka ba sa asawa? Dili ka magtinguha nga makabadbad. Nakabadbad ka ba sa asawa? Dili ka mangita ug asawa.
word.hebrewmodern: אם נקשרת באשה אל תבקש להפטר ואם נפטרת אל תבקש אשה׃
word.textusreceptus: δεδεσαι γυναικι μη ζητει λυσιν λελυσαι απο γυναικος μη ζητει γυναικα
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But he that is married careth for the things that are of the world, how he may please his wife.
word.thailand: แต่คนที่มีภรรยาแล้วก็สาละวนในการงานของโลกนี้เพื่อจะทำสิ่งที่พอใจของภรรยา
word.spanish1909: Empero el que se casó tiene cuidado de las cosas que son del mundo, cómo ha de agradar á su mujer.
word.latinvulgate: Qui autem cum uxore est, sollicitus est quæ sunt mundi, quomodo placeat uxori, et divisus est.

word.latinvulgate: Viri similiter cohabitantes secundum scientiam, quasi infirmiori vasculo muliebri impartientes honorem, tamquam et cohæredibus gratiæ vitæ : ut non impediantur orationes vestræ.
